@SazaKrom, yep, I complain about the plot quite often. It is story, and stories are subject to criticism. If the author did not want to make a plot, then he did not have to. Porn can tell a story, and quite frankly, I find it absurd that people try to defend these bad plots by saying, "It's just porn." Yes, and you should not criticize children's films because "they are for kids." It is just an excuse and allows creators to do the bare minimum to pass by. When I read these, I see the author making a story, characters, settings, and possible themes, however badly they may be doing it. Some of the most well-liked ones have a good story. Porn is another medium for storytelling, just in a more explicit manner. In fact, it can actually open up more avenues for creativity. This is why I care about plot in porn. Yes, yes, I am sure you are all going to mock me for my paragraph.
